showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Aeris}
“There's no time for this, right!?
Let's hurry after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // {Barret}
“What the hell are you doing?
Let's get {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Tifa}
“There's no time to relax.
Let's hurry after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Yuffie}
“Should we be this laid back?
Aren't we going after {Cait Sith}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cait Sith}
“Too bad.
It happens, though.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cait Sith}
“I know! Let's stay at the hotel!
They know me here.
I'll go talk to them.”
